body.p:
State of Rhode Island, &c.
Secretary's Office. Providence.

December 30th A.D. 1861
Nat. Gaither Esqr
Secretary of State
Sir
Mr Henry Martin, of this city, who has been for several years a commissioner of Deeds for Kentucky desires to be re-appointed
Mr Martin is well known to me, and I take great pleasure in recommending him as an efficient officer, and every way qualified to fill the office of Commissioner

I am very respectfully
Your obedient servant
John R. Bartlett
Sec'y of State

Rhode Island
Comr. of Deeds
Henry Martin
Providence
Comd. Jany 13. 1862
